question: Match the Usability Goal (Section 2.2) to its correct definition.
matches: How good a product is at doing what it is supposed to do.
The way a product supports users in carrying out their tasks.
Protecting the user from dangerous conditions and undesirable situations.
How easy a system is to learn to use.

answer.Effectiveness: How good a product is at doing what it is supposed to do.
